channel.title: steam login issue
channel.description:
I've been trying to add some dough to my steam wallet, however, whenever I get to the login page I enter my details (and yes I'm 100% sure that it's correct) and it tells me 'incorrect login'.
something's clearly wrong here- any ideas? much obliged.

item.description:
I dunno if this is related, but steam store and community pages went down for about half an hour tonight, afaik it only affected UK users
